version_description:
In this version: activity alerts and push notifications.

NEW FEATURES
* Added activity alert screen to create and edit alert rules (requires controller version 1.5.0+).
* Added camera motion alerts.
* Added camera offline alerts.
* Adde

* Added camera drawer in Timelapse screen to conveniently switch between cameras.

* Added Timeline pinch-to-zoom tutorial and scale in

FEATURES

Added

In this version: improved Talkback, bug fixes, and performance improvements.

IMPROVEMENTS
* Improved Talkback controls for iPhone and iPad.
* Improved Camera Drawer for 12.9 inch iPad.

FIXES
* Fixed a crash in Activity screen.
*

IMPROVEMENTS

* Controller update events are displayed in Activity screen.
* Show bot
